import React from 'react'; import plusButtonPath from '../images/plus.svg'; import ImagePopup from './ImagePopup'; import PopupWithForm from './PopupWithForm' import api from '../utils/Api' function Main(props) { const [userName, setUserName] = React.useState('#') const [userDescription, setUserDescription] = React.useState('#') const [userAvatar, setUserAvatar] = React.useState() React.useEffect(() => { api.getUserInfo().then((data) => { console.log(data) setUserName(data.name) }) }) return (

{userName}

); } export default Main;
